law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 50, effective July 1, 1982. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2877a-15, 2877a-16.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Female prisoners in city of first class -- Mayor to designate places of detention.
